org.apache.cassandra.db

Class Slice.Bound

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.db.AbstractClusteringPrefix
      • org.apache.cassandra.db.AbstractBufferClusteringPrefix
        • org.apache.cassandra.db.Slice.Bound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMeasurableMemory, Clusterable, ClusteringPrefix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RangeTombstone.Bound
    Enclosing class:
    Slice

    public static class Slice.Bound
extends AbstractBufferClusteringPrefix
    The bound of a slice.

    This can be either a start or an end bound, and this can be either inclusive or exclusive.

    • Field Detail

      • serializer

        public static final Slice.Bound.Serializer serializer

      • BOTTOM

        public static final Slice.Bound BOTTOM
        The smallest and biggest bound. Note that as range tomstone bounds are (special case) of slice bounds, we want the BOTTOM and TOP to be the same object, but we alias them here because it's cleaner when dealing with slices to refer to Slice.Bound.BOTTOM and Slice.Bound.TOP.

      • TOP

        public static final Slice.Bound TOP

      • invert

        public Slice.Bound invert()
        Returns the inverse of the current bound.

        This invert both start into end (and vice-versa) and inclusive into exclusive (and vice-versa).

        Returns:
        the invert of this bound. For instance, if this bound is an exlusive start, this return an inclusive end with the same values.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(CFMetaData metadata)
        Description copied from interface: ClusteringPrefix
        Generates a proper string representation of the prefix.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the metadata for the table the clustering prefix is of.
        Returns:
